Uses of Interface
org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions

  • Packages that use IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults
    Contains all interfaces need to provide defaults values of the chart options.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals
    Contains the default values of chart options for all chart types (CHART.JS options defaults).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.intl
    Contains classes in order to use the ECMAScript Internationalization API, which provides language sensitive number formatting, and date and time formatting.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.options
    Contains all elements to configure charts at global level (know as chart global options).

    • Uses of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults

      Subinterfaces of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IsDefaultDateTimeFormatOptions
      Interface to define the date time format options for internationalization.
      interface  IsDefaultNumberFormatOptions
      Interface to define the number format options for internationalization.

    • Uses of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals that implement IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultBaseFormatOptions
      INTL default values for locale matcher options for internationalization.
      class  DefaultDateTimeFormatOptions
      INTL default values for number format options for internationalization.
      class  DefaultNumberFormatOptions
      INTL default values for number format options for internationalization.
      Fields in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals declared as IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions DefaultBaseFormatOptions.INSTANCE 

    • Uses of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl

      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl that implement IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DateTimeFormatOptions
      The object configures a date time formatter.
      See MDN for more details.

      PAY ATTENTION
      The following methods are not supported on Edge and Safari.
      DateTimeFormatOptions.setDateStyle(DateTimeStyle) and DateTimeFormatOptions.getDateStyle() DateTimeFormatOptions.setTimeStyle(DateTimeStyle) and DateTimeFormatOptions.getTimeStyle()
      class  NumberFormatOptions
      The object configures a number formatter.
      See MDN for more details.

      PAY ATTENTION
      The following methods are not supported on Safari.
      NumberFormatOptions.setCompactDisplay(CompactDisplay) and NumberFormatOptions.getCompactDisplay() NumberFormatOptions.setCurrencySign(CurrencySign) and NumberFormatOptions.getCurrencySign() NumberFormatOptions.setNotation(Notation) and NumberFormatOptions.getNotation() NumberFormatOptions.setSignDisplay(SignDisplay) and NumberFormatOptions.getSignDisplay() NumberFormatOptions.setUnitsOfMeasure(List), NumberFormatOptions.setUnitsOfMeasure(MeasureUnit...) and NumberFormatOptions.getUnitsOfMeasure() NumberFormatOptions.setUnitOfMeasureDisplay(MeasureUnitDisplay) and NumberFormatOptions.getUnitOfMeasureDisplay()

    • Uses of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.options

      Subinterfaces of IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions in org.pepstock.charba.client.options 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IsNumberFormat
      Defines a configuration element which is a number format options.
      Classes in org.pepstock.charba.client.options that implement IsDefaultBaseFormatOptions 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TicksNumberFormat
      It applies the number formatting to the ticks of all linear scales.
